animeTitle: Mobile Suit Gundam Battlefield Record: Avant-Title
animeDescription: A short animation serving as a prequel to the events depicted in the PlayStation 3 game, Mobile Suit Gundam: Battlefield Record U.C. 0081.  (Source: AniDB)
